summary: This document is a Termination Agreement between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Trust Company, Inc., effective December 7, 2016. It outlines the mutual agreement to terminate a Master Agreement, stating that there are no outstanding transactions, obligations, or payments between the parties as of the termination date.

persons.name: Eduardo Waite
persons.context: Eduardo Waite is identified as the President of Deutsche Bank AG and is a signatory to the Termination Agreement.

persons.name: Sebastian Martinez
persons.context: Sebastian Martinez is identified as the Vice President of Deutsche Bank AG and is a signatory to the Termination Agreement.

keyFacts: The Termination Agreement is dated December 7, 2016.
The agreement states that there are no outstanding transactions or obligations between the parties.
Both parties waive their right to any notice period prior to termination.
The agreement is governed by the laws of the State of New York.
The parties consent to the exclusive jurisdiction of courts in Manhattan, New York City.
